projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description: Currently, KrollContext, for every event fired, uses a mutable array that has to be protected by a recursive lock. Given that these actions are a pure producer/consumer model, with one consumer and multiple producers, we can optimize out the locks and make a cleaner implementation that may be reusable, as well.
fields.summary: Streamline iOS KrollContext to reduce lock dependancy
